price: We sent against them a furious wind[7] on a day of continuous misfortune,
arabic: إِنَّآ أَرۡسَلۡنَا عَلَيۡهِمۡ رِيحٗا صَرۡصَرٗا فِي يَوۡمِ نَحۡسٖ مُّسۡتَمِرّٖ
footnotes: [7] i.e., a tumultuous and screaming wind.
